Trade/Device Name(s): Human IgM Kit for use on SPAPlus
Human IgM kit for use on SPAPLUS®
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, and E immunological test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Human IgM Kit for use on SPAPlus, a turbidimetric immunology assay for quantitation of IgM in serum or plasma.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative in vitro determination of human IgM in serum, lithium heparin or EDTA plasma using the Binding Site SPAPlus analyser to aid in diagnosing abnormal protein metabolism and immune deficiency, interpreted alongside clinical findings.
